name: 星月なるこ(Hoshitsuki Naruko)
story:
Naruko is an elf from Álfheimr
Naruko's family got killed by their enemies, and Naruko was the only survivor
Naruko tried to escape from the enemies, when Naruko ran to the cliff,
 enemies caught up to Naruko
Naruko tried to fly up to the sky, enemies shot Naruko's wings.
Naruko fall down.
When Naruko woke up, Naruko came to the human world.
Naruko use magic to hide elf's features.
Naruko's wings can't be healed, so Naruko can't fly anymore.
Naruko knows can't back Álfheimr, so Naruko decided to live in the human world.
